name: Super Barrel Bash
description:
Two player arcade platformer. Toss barrels and flip gravity!

Simple and competitive, but you need a friend.

Made for Global Game Jam 2015, the theme was 'What do we do now?' This version has the major bugs fixed and has music and sound added. The original has some pretty funny glitches though so if you want to play it download it from here http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/super-barrel-b....
